etymology.description: 中正 (Chiang Kai-shek’s courtesy name) + 区 = administrative district named “Zhongzheng District.”
etymology.interpretation: Named in honor of Chiang Kai-shek (courtesy name 中正), it denotes the central Taipei administrative district. Outside toponymy, 中正 can mean “upright/just,” but here it functions as a personal name.
etymology.simplification: 區 → 区 via mainland script reform adopting a simpler/variant form to reduce strokes; Taiwan retains 區 (officially 中正區).

examples.chinese: 我住在台北市中正区(我住在臺北市中正區)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zhù zài Táiběi Shì Zhōngzhèng Qū.
examples.english: I live in Zhongzheng District, Taipei.

examples.chinese: 中正区有许多政府机关(中正區有許多政府機關)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngzhèng Qū yǒu xǔduō zhèngfǔ jīguān.
examples.english: Zhongzheng District has many government agencies.

examples.chinese: 我们在中正纪念堂散步(我們在中正紀念堂散步)。
examples.english: We took a walk at the Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall.
